alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 8:21AM CDT until April 01 at 9:46AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... St. Francis River near Patterson. .Recent heavy rainfall created a rapid rise on the St Francis River at Patterson. The river has risen above flood stage, and will crest at 19.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage by sunrise Friday. For the St. Francis River...including Patterson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St. Francis River near Patterson. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
